櫰字的基本解释

櫰
huái
〔櫰槐〕落叶乔木，奇数羽状复叶，荚果扁平，长椭圆形至条形，木材质地坚硬细密，供建筑、做器具、雕刻等用，种子可榨油。亦称“山槐”。

櫰
guī
古书上说的一种树：“（中曲之山）有木焉，其状如棠，而员（圆）叶赤实，实大如木瓜，名曰櫰木，食之多力。”

櫰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huái］
［《廣韻》户乖切，平皆，匣。］
木名。
[②]［guī］
［《廣韻》公回切，平灰，見。］
(1)木名。
(2)见“櫰2香”。

櫰字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　櫰； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页561第32
【唐韻】戸乖切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】乎乖切，?音槐。【玉篇】槐之別名。【爾雅·釋木】櫰槐，大葉而黑。　又【集韻】戸賄切，音廆。義同。　又【唐韻】公回切【集韻】【韻會】姑回切，?音傀。【山海經】中曲山有木，如棠，而圓葉赤實，實大如木瓜，名曰櫰，食之多力。　又【本草綱目】櫰香，卽《楞嚴經》兜婁婆香也。

櫰字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
櫰字的起名意思

暂无。

櫰
Basic explanation of words
櫰
huái
[Acacia] deciduous tree, odd-pinnate compound leaves, flat pods, oblong to strip shape, hard and fine wood texture, used for construction, making utensils, carving, etc. The seeds can be squeezed out of oil. Also known as "Mountain Sophora".
櫰
guī
A kind of tree said in ancient books: "(The mountain of the middle song) has wood yan, which looks like a tang, while the member (round) leaves are red and as big as a papaya, and the name is 櫰木.
櫰
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huái］
["Guangyun" households are obediently cut, flat, boxed. ]
Wooden name.
[②]［guī］
["Guang Yun" Gong Hui cut, flat gray, see. ]
(1) Wooden name.
(2) See "櫰2香".
櫰
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　櫰; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 561 32
[Tang Yun] Be obediently cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme will] [Zheng Yun] Almost obediently cut,? Yin Huai. [Jade articles] Alias of Huai. [Erya·Shimu] Sophora japonicus, with big leaves and black.　 [Ji Yun] cut bribery, sound. The same meaning.　[Tang Yun] Gong Hui cuts [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Goss back to cut,? Sound puppet. [Shanhaijing] Zhongqu Mountain has trees, such as tang, while round leaves are red, and they are as big as papaya. The name is 櫰, which eats much power.　[Compendium of Materia Medica] 櫰香, 卽"Surrangama Sutra" dou Lou Po Xiang also.
櫰
